name: opencc-extension
description: A browser extension to convert webpages between different Chinese variants.

scripts.start:firefox: concurrently "NODE_ENV='development' BROWSER='firefox' pnpm build:watch" "wait-on ./build/manifest.json && pnpm run start"
scripts.start:chromium: concurrently "NODE_ENV='development' BROWSER='chrome' pnpm build:watch" "wait-on ./build/manifest.json && pnpm run start -t chromium"
scripts.dist:chrome: NODE_ENV='production' BROWSER='chrome' pnpm run build ./dist/chrome && web-ext build -s ./dist/chrome -a . -n opencc.chrome.zip
scripts.dist:firefox: NODE_ENV='production' BROWSER='firefox' pnpm run build ./dist/firefox && web-ext build -s ./dist/firefox -a . -n opencc.firefox.zip
scripts.dist: concurrently "pnpm run dist:chrome" "pnpm run dist:firefox" && rm -rf ./dist
